Sam Cassell

Pronunciation: \kuh-SEHL\

Samuel James Cassell

(Sam I Am)

Position: Point Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-3, 185lb (190cm, 83kg)

Born: November 18, 1969 in Baltimore, Maryland us

College: Florida State

High Schools: Paul Laurence Dunbar in Baltimore, Maryland, Maine Central Institute in Pittsfield, Maine

Draft: Houston Rockets, 1st round (24th pick, 24th overall), 1993 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: November 5, 1993

Career Length: 15 years

  • 1x All Star
  • 3x NBA Champ
  • 2003-04 All-NBA

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Sam Cassell?

Sam Cassell is 55 years old.

Where was Sam Cassell born?

Sam Cassell was born in Baltimore, Maryland.

When was Sam Cassell born?

Sam Cassell was born on November 18, 1969.

How tall is Sam Cassell?

Sam Cassell is 6-3 (190 cm) tall.

How much did Sam Cassell weigh when playing?

Sam Cassell weighed 185 lbs (83 kg) when playing.

Is Sam Cassell in the Hall of Fame?

Sam Cassell is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Sam Cassell drafted?

Sam Cassell was drafted by Houston Rockets, 1st round (24th pick, 24th overall), 1993 NBA Draft.

What position did Sam Cassell play?

Point Guard.

When did Sam Cassell retire?

Sam Cassell last played in 2008.

What is Sam Cassell's net worth?

Sam Cassell made at least $58,419,775 playing professional basketball.

How much did Sam Cassell make?

Sam Cassell made $6,875,000 in 2006.

What did Sam Cassell average?

Sam Cassell averaged 15.7 points, 3.2 rebounds, and 6.0 assists per game.

How many rings does Sam Cassell have?

Sam Cassell won 3 championships.

What schools did Sam Cassell attend?

Sam Cassell attended Paul Laurence Dunbar in Baltimore, Maryland, Maine Central Institute in Pittsfield, Maine and Florida State.

What are Sam Cassell's nicknames?

Sam I Am is a nickname for Sam Cassell.
